Fig. 7: NodeTrix visualization of the information visualization ﬁeld. This is the largest connected component extracted from the dataset used in the Infovis’04 Contest available at http://www.cs.umd.edu/hcil/iv04contest/. We manually removed a couple of remaining duplicated authors. Colors on axes of matrices represent the number of citations of each author. Color intensity within the matrices represents the strength of each collaboration.
